root.name: The King of Dragons
root.description: OverviewThe King of Dragons is a side scrolling fantasy hack and slash. At the start of the game you and your friend can choose from five character classes which include an Elf archer, Wizard, Fighter, Cleric or a Dwarf.Â Each class gets an upgraded weapon or armor every couple of levels. You and your friend can fight through hordes of goblins, skeletons, fish people and more and at the end of each level you encounter a challenging boss.The King of Dragons was ported to the Super Nintendo in 1994.
